page.title: 07St.Michael's,Little Horsted.
page.content: This{13th Century Church}commands extensive views. Its congregation comes from rural areas & Ridgewood which has a growing population. The curate feels that the Services should 'suit' people living in the area. On an average Sunday 25-30 people attend the main{Communion Service.}Family Services are more popular. The Church has problems with its {heating.}As it is only used regularly on Sundays instant heat is cheapest. Since 1982 when the system broke,temp- orary heaters have been used but they have damaged the fabric of the Church. Radiant heaters have now been approved by the{Diocesan Arts Council}although they objected on aesthetic grounds. The tapestry{kneelers}are special. Each one represents a house in the Parish. They were designed and made by people connected with the Parish.
